text: Ripp may refer to: ==As a surname== * Andrew Ripp, American singer-songwriter * Artie Ripp, American music industry executive * Hans-Jürgen Ripp, American politician * Keith Ripp, German association football player ==Other== * Friend Ripp, a 1923 German silent film * Ribosomally synthesized and post- translationally modified peptides (RiPP), a class of peptides ==See also== * Ripps (disambiguation)
title: Ripp
